Package org.eclipse.emf.compare.internal.adapterfactory.context

Class ContextUtil

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.emf.compare.internal.adapterfactory.context.ContextUtil
public final class ContextUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Utility class for evaluating context testers in adapter factory descriptors.
Since:
4.3

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean apply​(ComposedAdapterFactory.Descriptor adapterFactoryDescriptor, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,​java.lang.Object> context)
    Returns whether the adapter factory should be applied in the given context.
    static boolean isNullContext​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,​java.lang.Object> context)
    Evaluates whether the given context is a null context, i.e., the context itself is null, it has no entries or all its values are null.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public static boolean apply​(ComposedAdapterFactory.Descriptor adapterFactoryDescriptor, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,​java.lang.Object> context)
      Returns whether the adapter factory should be applied in the given context.
      Parameters:
      adapterFactoryDescriptor - the ComposedAdapterFactory.Descriptor containing the adapter factory and possibly a context tester
      context - the context
      Returns:
      false if the descriptor's context tester indicates no responsibility for the given comparison, true otherwise.
      See Also:
      IContextTester.apply(Map)

    • isNullContext

      public static boolean isNullContext​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,​java.lang.Object> context)
      Evaluates whether the given context is a null context, i.e., the context itself is null, it has no entries or all its values are null.
      Parameters:
      context - the context
      Returns:
      true if the context is null, empty or all its values are null, false otherwise.
